plot: Bugs Bunny exploits the situation when an uncle leaves Elmer Fudd three million dollars on the condition that he harm no animals, especially rabbits.
title: The Wabbit Who Came to Supper
plot_es: Bugs Bunny exploits the situation when an uncle leaves Elmer Fudd three million dollars on the condition that he harm no animals, especially rabbits.
original_name: The Wabbit Who Came to Supper
plot_en: Bugs Bunny exploits the situation when an uncle leaves Elmer Fudd three million dollars on the condition that he harm no animals, especially rabbits.

cast.role: Bugs Bunny /              Telegram Boy /              Delivery Man
cast.name: Mel Blanc
